title: Charleston was convicted of shooting Dylan, child's pier, actor John Christian Grass.
subtitle: The conviction of the shooter from the Church of Charleston Dylan Ruff led to the re-publishing of rumors that he was in fact a former child star and crisis actor named John Christian Grass.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The shooter at the Church of Charleston Dylan Ruff is in fact a former child star and crisis actor named John Christian Grass.
